<!--<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>-->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Tajawal">
<svg id="Layer_1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1920 1080">
    <defs>
        <style>
            .cls-1,
            .cls-2 {
                fill: #fff;
            }

            .cls-3 {
                fill: #878787;
            }

            .cls-3,
            .cls-4,
            .cls-5,
            .cls-6,
            .cls-2,
            .cls-7 {
                stroke-miterlimit: 10;
            }

            .cls-3,
            .cls-4,
            .cls-6 {
                stroke: #000;
            }

            .cls-8 {
                fill: #003a3f;
                font-size: 33px;
            }

            .cls-8,
            .cls-9,
            .cls-10 {
                font-family: Tajawal-Bold, Tajawal;
                font-weight: 700;
            }

            .cls-9 {
                fill: #022122;
                font-size: 72px;
            }

            .cls-11 {
                fill: #2d8d79;
            }

            .cls-12 {
                fill: #7d7f85;
                font-family: Tajawal-Medium, Tajawal;
                font-size: 24px;
                font-weight: 500;
            }

            .cls-5 {
                stroke: #022122;
            }

            .cls-5,
            .cls-6,
            .cls-7 {
                fill: none;
            }

            .cls-5,
            .cls-2 {
                stroke-width: 1.5px;
            }

            .cls-6 {
                stroke-width: 3px;
            }

            .cls-10 {
                fill: #033a3f;
                font-size: 149px;
            }

            .cls-2,
            .cls-7 {
                stroke: #2d8d79;
            }

            .cls-7 {
                stroke-dasharray: 0 0 12 12;
                stroke-width: 2px;
            }
        </style>
    </defs>
    <rect class="cls-1" width="1920" height="1080" />
    <g>
